title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LangChain LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Lightweight Go CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API for quick prompts and model ops.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama with async streaming, chat, and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, and RAG extras.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for Q&A over PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models from any channel or DM.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template powered by Ollama and LangChain with session memory.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and module for declarative macOS/NixOS deployments.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless container image of Ollama for minimal attack surface and faster pulls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings to the Ollama API with Tokio.
